title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.22 - Enforcement procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.22 - Enforcement procedures

State Regulations

The enforcement procedure of this Part with respect to
effluent quality requirements for discharges shall be deemed applicable to the
enforcement of this section and Part 860 of this Title. For the purposes
thereof, the word discharger as used in this Part, includes any party affected
by this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
861.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
